Package com.ticketfly.pillage

Interface Summary
AsyncStatsContainer.StatsCommand  
Distribution Metrics are represented at a statistical distribution.
Gauge A gauge is an operation can be read.
Metric A metric collects data points
MetricFactory Create a new metric
StatsCollector This is the interface that provides access to statistics.
StatsContainer A stats provider gives access to gather statistics
StatsReporter  
 

Class Summary

AsyncStatsContainer  
AsyncStatsContainer.ClearLabel  
AsyncStatsContainer.SetLabel  
ConsoleStatsReporter This is a very simple reporter that just prints the stats to System.out
Counter This is a simple class to count stuff.
GangliaStatsReporter An implementation of StatsReporter that fires a StatsSummary to Ganglia over UDP.

GraphiteStatsReporter  
Histogram Collect data points into buckets
HistogramDistribution A distribution based on a histogram
HistogramMetric This is a metric backed by a histogram.
HistogramMetricFactory  
PeriodicCollectionScheduler This is a singleton that allows you to schedule collections for a StatsCollector.
PeriodicCollectionScheduler.StatsCollectorRunner Inner class that wraps a StatsCollector in runnable so the scheduler can call collect().
StatsCollectorImpl Attaches to a StatsContainer and reports on all the counters, metrics, gauges, and labels.
StatsCollectorMBean Expose a stats collector as an MBean
StatsContainerImpl This class acts as a container for stats
StatsSummary A small object to encapsulate a summary of stats.
StatUtils StatUtilities
Timer A timer times stuff and uses a metric to track the durations in milliseconds.
